document_data.caption: A map showing the Breezeway and surroundings in the Field Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: The Breezeway
document_data.mainbody: The '''Breezeway''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]] during the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Breezeway was located in the eastern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Field Ward|Field Ward]]. The road branched southeast from an unnamed courtyard, turning south through a small neighborhood. [[Endshift Street]] joined with the northeast side of the Breezeway.
